Title: How to Enroll in MNT Bank Online Banking Service
Objective: Guide users through the process of enrolling in MNT Bank's online banking platform to access digital banking services
TargetAudience: New MNT Bank customers who want to set up online banking access

StepByStepInstructions.Instruction: Download and open the MNT Bank mobile app
StepByStepInstructions.Example: Locate the MNT Bank app on your mobile device

StepByStepInstructions.Instruction: Tap the 'Enroll' button below the login section
StepByStepInstructions.Example: Look for the enrollment option on the main login screen
Choose between Personal, Business, or Business and Personal account

StepByStepInstructions.Purpose: Verify your identity and link to your bank account
StepByStepInstructions.Example: Input your account number, Social Security number, date of birth, and debit card information

StepByStepInstructions.Instruction: Tap Continue and complete additional verification steps
StepByStepInstructions.Example: Follow any additional prompts to complete the registration

ImportantNotes: To enroll in online banking, you must already have an existing MNT Bank account. Have your account number, Social Security number, debit card, and personal information ready before starting the enrollment process. This service provides access to bill payments, transaction history, and other banking services 24/7 from any location.
